actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations, H. Rept. 93-1111.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #307 (392-4).
Referred to Senate Committee on Appropriations.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Appropriations with amendment, S. Rept. 93-1048.
Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #350 (69-2).
Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 93-1270.
House agreed to conference report, roll call #480 (394-3).
House receded and concurred in certain Senate amendments.
House receded and concurred with amendment in certain Senate amendments.
Senate agreed to House amendments to Senate amendments.

official_title: An Act making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Transportation and Related Agencies Appropriation Act

summary.text: Department of Transportation and Related Agencies Appropriation Act - Title I: Department of Transportation - Authorizes appropriations for fiscal year 1975 for the Department of Transportation, including authorizations for the Office of the Secretary; for transportation planning, research, and development; and grants-in-aid for natural gas pipeline safety. Authorizes appropriations for specified activities of the Coast Guard, Federal Aviation Administration, Federal Highway Administration, National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, Federal Railroad Administration, Urban Mass Transportation Administration, and the Saint Lawrence Seaway Development Corporation. Title II: Related Agencies - Authorizes appropriations for the National Transportation Safety Board, Civil Aeronautics Board, Interstate Commerce Commission, Panama Canal, and Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority. Title III: General Provisions - States that during the current fiscal year applicable appropriations to the Department of Transportation shall be available for the maintenance and operation of aircraft; hire of passenger motor vehicles and aircraft; and uniforms, or allowances therefor, as authorized by law. Enumerates activities and expenses of the Department of Transportation and related agencies for which the funds authorized by this Act shall not be available or for which there shall be specified spending limits.
